original_text:
If I had cherished iniquity in my heart,
    the Lord would not have listened.
korean_text: 내가 나의 마음에 죄악을 품었더라면 주께서 듣지 아니하시리라

sentences.original_text: If I had cherished iniquity in my heart
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 내가 내 마음에 죄악을 품었더라면

sentences.original_text: the Lord would not have listened.
